text: Ready for a fun night of trick-or-treating? At Target, find a wide range of kids halloween costumes to choose from. Whether they are off to a Halloween party with their friends or going out for a night of trick-or-treating, the perfect halloween costume is just a click away! Let them dress up as their favorite characters. Choose from characters like Pikachu, T-Rex, superhero costumes, glow-in-the-dark costumes and more. Look through kids costumes from their favorite games and movie. Pick from Fortnite, Disney, Lightyear, Mandalorian, Ninja, Incredibles, Pokemon, Spider Man and more. You can also find accessories to go with these costumes. Find masks, wigs, swords and more. These kids halloween costumes are made from soft fabric and is sure to keep them snug and comfy throughout the night. Explore a large collection of kids’ halloween costumes to find the perfect outfit.
